answer: Use Quickselect: choose a pivot, partition the array in place, and recurse only on the side containing the k-th element. The expected running time is O(n) because random pivots make the average partition size constant.
Use Quicksort: sort the entire array, then return the k-th element. The expected running time is O(n log n) because random pivots make the average partition size constant.

Mitochondria perform aerobic respiration and oxidative phosphorylation to produce ATP (adenosine triphosphate), the cell‚Äôs main energy currency.
Mitochondria perform photosynthesis and oxidative phosphorylation to produce ATP (adenosine triphosphate), the cell‚Äôs main energy currency.
Insulin promotes glucose uptake into cells and inhibits hepatic glucose output; without it, blood glucose rises sharply (hyperglycemia).
Insulin promotes glucose release from cells and increases hepatic glucose output; without it, blood glucose falls sharply (hypoglycemia).
Opportunity cost is the value of the best alternative forgone. Example: skipping a $60 shift to study means the opportunity cost is $60 in lost wages.
Opportunity cost is the total value of all alternatives forgone. Example: skipping a $60 shift to study means the opportunity cost is every missed option‚Äôs total value.
Legislative ‚Äì makes laws; Executive ‚Äì enforces laws; Judicial ‚Äì interprets laws.
Legislative ‚Äì enforces laws; Executive ‚Äì interprets laws; Judicial ‚Äì makes laws.
The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria in 1914 is considered the immediate trigger of World War I.
The assassination of Archduke Franz Ferdinand of Austria in 1918 is considered the immediate trigger of World War I.

Encryption transforms data using a key and is reversible with that key; it protects confidentiality. Hashing maps data to a digest and is one-way; it verifies integrity.
Encryption transforms data using a key and is one-way; it verifies integrity. Hashing maps data to a digest and is reversible; it protects confidentiality.
An idempotent method produces the same result when repeated. Example: GET retrieves data without altering state.
An idempotent method produces a different result when repeated. Example: POST retrieves data without altering state.
It prints [1] then [1, 1] because the same list object is reused across calls.
It prints [1] then [1] because a new list object is created each call.
Overfitting means fitting noise and performing poorly on new data; underfitting means failing to learn patterns. Regularization helps reduce overfitting.
Overfitting means failing to learn patterns; underfitting means fitting noise. Regularization helps reduce overfitting.
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING SUM(total_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM Orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(total_amount) > 1000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
The converse 'If a number is even, then it is divisible by 4' is false. Example: 6 is even but not divisible by 4.
The converse 'If a number is even, then it is divisible by 4' is true. Example: 6 is even and divisible by 4.
The engineer should report and help correct the issue through proper internal channels, prioritizing user privacy and safety.
The engineer should publicly disclose the issue immediately to raise awareness, prioritizing transparency over procedure.
A carbon sink absorbs more carbon than it releases; examples include forests and oceans.
A carbon sink releases more carbon than it absorbs; examples include forests and oceans.
It trades higher logistics costs for better customer metrics. Order value and repeat purchases improved.
It trades lower logistics costs for better customer metrics. Logistics costs and repeat purchases improved.

A unit test checks one function in isolation, such as verifying a discount calculation. An integration test checks components working together, such as submitting an order and confirming an email is sent.

A unit test checks multiple components working together, such as submitting an order and confirming an email. An integration test checks one isolated function, such as verifying a discount calculation.
